TopicTitle: Well there ever be interactive pod interiors?

Articles.Content:
By interactive, I mean something that you can move around inside of. That simple. I think it would really enhance the whole station experience, as it would really feel like a place to stay. The same goes for bases. You could move around when near walls (implying that the Kerbal is grabbing the nearby wall somewhere) and then drift off in whatever direction the player wanted until another wall was reached. For even further use, you could do it like they do at the ISS; attaching things of science to velcro-covered walls. This would just really enhance the space experience.

EDIT: Whoops. This is already in the suggested list. My bad. But the velcro of science thing's still valid.

Edited June 23, 2014 by YourEverydayWaffle

The devs have indicated that that is on their wish list, but the list of features they're targeting changes over time and they haven't discussed this in a long time, so we can't be sure that this is still on the list of things they want for 1.0.
